page.title: 02HARE LANE,PUDSEY:WORK & HOME
page.content: {South Park Trading Estate}is in a Green Belt,in the wooded Fulneck Valley,where the eleven firms occupy an old mill built a century ago.On average they have been there seven years.Some are one-man businesses:A1 Fencing,Fowler Motors and a blacksmith.Busy PSL shopfitters supply nationwide stores e.g.Stylo,M.& S.In a noisy yard,with weighbridge and guard dog,Autoscrap refines aluminium,while two firms work with sheet metal.The{residents}of Hare Lane tolerate the noisy lorries.Some live in small terraced houses at the top or bottom of the lane.A pig farmer has built a bungalow;a local shopkeeper has rebuilt a farm house as a modern home;another family lives in a comfortable Victorian villa.They all value the peace and natural beauty of the area.
